title: MEF and Sofis use Quarkus as core component of a new innovative architecture
content: About us The Ministry of Economy and Finance (MEF) of Uruguay is a government ministry. Website: https://www.gub.uy/ministerio-economia-finanzas Sofis Solutions is a company with more than 18 years of experience in the digital transformation of Latin American organizations and technological inclusion. Focuses mainly on projects for the development of digital government...
